metadata.title: CVE-2021-38604 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
In librt in the GNU C Library (aka glibc) through 2.34, sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/mq_notify.c mishandles certain NOTIFY_REMOVED data, leading to a NULL pointer dereference. NOTE: this vulnerability was introduced as a side effect of the CVE-2021-33574 fix.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-38604` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

glibc-source - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc-bin - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-amd64 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-i386 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-prof - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-s390 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
libc6-x32 - 2.34-0ubuntu3
locales - 2.34-0ubuntu3
locales-all - 2.34-0ubuntu3
nscd - 2.34-0ubuntu3
No subscription required

notes.note: sbeattie> 21.04 and earlier are not affected due to the fix for CVE-2021-33574 having not been introduced yet.

criterions.comment: glibc package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.34-0ubuntu3').
